#summary Xerox Phaser 6130 and 6140 Imaging Unit EEPROM

= What's this? =

The imaging unit of the Xerox 6130 and 6140 printer also has a page counter built in. The Information is stored in a EEPROM similar to that in the cartridges. 

Information about how to read this information out can be found [http://xeroxpatrone.googlecode.com/files/6125-6130_ImageUnit_Connector.pdf here].

A EEPROM dump is available for the [http://xeroxpatrone.googlecode.com/files/6130_ImageUnit_1073pages.bin Phaser 6130] as well as for the [http://xeroxpatrone.googlecode.com/files/6140_ImageUnit_6258pages%2080perc.bin Phaser 6140].
